Question.Subject: What's the name of the website that allows you to click a button and go to random sites that they choose?
Question.Content:
One of my friends showed me a site that allows you to say a few broad categories that you're interested in and then click a button to go to random sites of their choosing.
Does anyone know the name of this site? Thanks!
Question.ChosenAnswer: http://www.stumbleupon.com/ StumbleUpon helps you discover and share great websites. As you click Stumble!, we deliver high-quality pages matched to your personal preferences.

Answer.Content: http://www.stumbleupon.com/ StumbleUpon helps you discover and share great websites. As you click Stumble!, we deliver high-quality pages matched to your personal preferences.
